title: intro
wording: Hi! I am Nathan and I am a front-end web developer!

title: about
wording: I'm Nathan, I am a web developer based in Manchester, with one year commercial experience under my belt!
wording2: I have been developing websites since 2016 and I have a first class degree in Web Design and Development.
wording3: I have experience in using, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript ranging from JQuery all the way to ReactJS, React Native, and GatsbyJS!
wording4: I am available for freelance work, if you would like to use my services be sure to throw me a line.
